name: Cell Hunter (Conway's Game of Life Mod)
name_original: Cell Hunter (Conway's Game of Life Mod)
description:
OVERVIEW

Cell Hunter is based on Conway's Game of Life, a classic cellular automaton devised by the British mathematician John Horton Conway in 1970.

Unlike its inspiration which is a zero-player game, in Cell Hunter, you have the ablity to move around, feed on other cells, and even create some from the scratch.

The challenge is to find an efficient and sustainable way to hunt cells as many as possible, before you run out of moves.

CONTROLS

W/A/S/D to move

Click/Drag left mouse button on blank grid to create new cells to feed on

A personal project developed at the NYU Game Center for Prototype Studio class.
